main_content: Certifications and Compliance The provision of software, hardware and maintenance from a single source guarantees our companies unparalleled reliability, security and efficiency for their customers' solutions. Our infrastructure complies with ISO 27001 and we are audited according to ISAE 3402. ISO 27001 We have implemented quality management processes for information security based on the international standard ISO 27001. This ensures the highest level of security for all assets we own. Download Certificate Download Certificate ISO 27001, Phoenix Technologies AG (1).pdf (application/pdf, 338 B) ISAE 3402 Type II ISAE 3402 type 2 compliance means that we consistently deliver AI-cloud and confidential cloud solutions that meet the highest standards of security, data privacy, and compliance in Switzerland. Download Certificate Download Phoenix Systems ISAE 3402 Type 2 2023 (1).pdf (application/pdf, 1.22 kB) FINMA 2018/3 Companies or individuals wishing to engage in financial-market activity need authorization from FINMA, which checks that they meet the relevant regulatory requirements. Phoenix Technologies is outsourcing-compliant and therefore an ideal partner for banks, insurance companies and financial institutions.
